Reviews.Title: Regular Cellphone
Reviews.Author: Fernando
Reviews.Content: I order this phone because I really like the Xperia line, I don't have enough money for a Xperia Z and wanted some decent Xperia phone, this one has a very nice design but the performance is regular and the battery life is very poor.

Reviews.Title: Good smartphone but with big problems
Reviews.Author: Hichem
Reviews.Content: Overall the smartphone is good, the phone looks great the software too but there three major problems :- the 1700 mah battery don't even reach 15 hours on standby mode (no call, no internet, nothing ..) !! if I use internet, wifi, play a game the battery will live for less then 2 or 3 hours. a normal use of the phone (get and make calls/sms) will make it required to recharge the battery every 6 hours , this is really bad. What 's  the good of having a phone if I have to charge it every 6 hours ??- the phone gets hot (sometime very hot) after only 10 min when the screen is working on anything ( internet , game, local application, camera ..). It get too hot on back top of the phone and on the screen, this problem look to be common for sony smartphones..- the charger cable is "too" short (about 20 cm), what were the constructor thinking when they set the cable length ?? The only way to charge it easily is to put it on my computer desk and connect the cable to any usb entry ..I was looking to change my "HTC one S" with this smartphone but I admit that I'm really disoppointed
